participant_1.name: Alex Johnson
participant_1.personality: Friendly and approachable, Alex enjoys engaging in deep conversations and values connections with others.
participant_1.background: Alex grew up in a small town and moved to the city for college. He enjoys exploring different cultures and cuisines.

participant_2.name: Maria Lopez
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and optimistic, Maria loves to lighten the mood and bring a smile to people's faces.
participant_2.background: Maria is originally from a multicultural city and has a passion for art and community service.
